name: The Serpencrest Legacy: Kemetia
description:
My Game is currently up for Greenlight on Steam as well!

A fun, turned based role playing game (RPG) with adventure, dungeon crawling, exploration, multiple party management and much, much more! Enjoy developing characters, managing their equipment, gaining experience levels to learn new skills, take on fun yet challenging quests while being immersed in the vast world of Amena!

You can:

*Manage multiple parties simultaneously even while they're playing through different scenarios in different areas

*Have multiple parties progress through similar or even the same quests

*Switch between parties at later points in the game to start and/or finish quests as you choose

*Build up ruins, revive enemy lairs that you have conquered as your own

*Craft items, weapons, armor and even furniture to furnish your properties

*Seek out unique characters that have unique classes and skills that you can't otherwise access

Be sure to check back regularly for updates!

Feel free to get Kemetia greenlit on Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

It can also be purchased here (good place to go when the game is updating here for patches or the access link is down): https://my.digitalgoodsstore.com/product/7zooq
